text:
vi pAja#sAq >17, vi jyOti#ShA >18 || 
sa tvama#gnEq pratI#kEnaq pratyO#Sha yAtudhAqnya#H | 
uqruqkShayE#Shuq dIdya#t ||
ta(gm) suqpratI#ka(gm) suqdRuSaq(gg)q sva~jcaqmavi#dvA(gm)sO viqduShTa#ra(gm) sapEma |
sa ya#kShaq-dviSvA# vaqyunA#ni viqdvAn pra haqvyamaqgniraqmRutE#Shu vOcat ||
aq(gm)qhOqmucE# >19, viqvEShaq yanmAq >20, vina# iqndrE >21, ndra# kShaqtra >22
mi#ndriqyANi# SatakraqtO >23, &nu# tE dAyi >24 || 74 
(yaqhvIH sa - ma#dhvaqrAya# nOq - varu#Na(gm) - rAjaq(gg)q -tu#ScatvAri(gm)Sacca) (A12)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- 
(viqSvarU#paq - stvaShTE - ndra#M ~MvRuqtraM - bra#hmavAqdinaqH sa tvai - nA&sO#mayAjyEq - Sha vai dE#varaqthO - dEqvA vai narci nA - yaqj~jO - &gnE# maqhAn - trIn - nivI#taq - mAyu#ShTEq - dvAda#Sa)

Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(viqSvarU#pOq - naina(gm)# SItarUqrA - vaqdya vasu# - pUrvEqdyu - rvAjAq itya - gnE# maqhAn - nivI#ta - maqnyA yantiq - 
catu#H saptatiH )

First and Last Padam of Fifth Prasnam of Kandam 2:-
(viqSvarUpOq - &nu# tE dAyi)

|| hari#H OM ||
|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakANDE pa~jcamaH praSnaH samAptaH ||

2.5.1	 Appendix
2.5.12.1 - Ayu#ShTa >1, AyuqrdA a#gnaq >2
Ayu#ShTE viqSvatO# dadhadaqyamaqgni rvarE$NyaH | 
puna#stE prAqNa Aya#tiq parAq yakShma(gm)# suvAmi tE | 

AqyuqrdA a#gnE haqviShO# juShAqNO GRuqtapra#tIkO GRuqtayO#nirEdhi | 
GRuqtaM pIqtvA madhuq cAruq gavya#M piqtEva# puqtramaqBi ra#kShatAdiqmaM | 
(Appearing in TS -1.3.14.4 )

2.5.12.1 - A pyA#yasvaq >3, saM tE >4
ApyA#svaq samE#tu tE viqSvata#H sOmaq vRuShNi#yaM |
BavAq vAja#sya saMgaqthE | 

saM tEq payA(gm)#siq samu# yantuq vAjAqH saM ~MvRuShNi#yAn. yaBimAtiqShAha#H |
AqpyAya#mAnO aqmRutA#ya sOma diqvi SravA(gg)#syuttaqmAni# dhiShva || 
(Appearing in TS- 4-2-7-4)

2.5.12.1 - ava# tEq hEDaq>5, udu#ttaqmaM>6
ava# tEq hEDO# varuNaq namO#Biqrava# yaqj~jEBi#rImahE haqvirBi#H | 
kShaya#nnaqsmaBya#masura pracEtOq rAjaqnnEnA(gm)#si SiSrathaH kRuqtAni# || 

udu#ttaqmaM ~Mva#ruNaq pASa#maqsmadavA#&dhaqmaM ~Mvima#dhyaqma(gg) Sra#thAya | 
athA# vaqyamA#ditya vraqtE tavA&nA#gasOq adi#tayE syAma ||
(Appearing in TS- 1.5.11.3)

2.5.12.1 - praNO# dEqvyA>7, nO# diqvO>8
praNO# dEqvI sara#svatIq vAjE#BirvAqjinI#vatI | dhIqnAma#viqtrya#vatu ||

A nO# diqvO bRu#haqtaH parva#tAqdA sara#svatI yajaqtA ga#ntu yaqj~jaM | 
hava#M dEqvI ju#juShAqNA GRuqtAcI# SaqgmAM nOq vAca#muSaqtI SRu#NOtu ||
(Appearing in TS - 1.8.22.1)

2.5.12.1 - agnA# viShNUq>9, agnA#viShNU>10
agnA#viShNUq mahiq tadvA$M mahiqtvaM ~MvIqtaM GRuqtasyaq guhyA#niq nAma# | 
damE#damE saqpta ratnAq dadhA#nAq prati# ~MvAM jiqhvA GRuqtamA ca#raNyEt ||

agnA#viShNUq mahiq dhAma# priqyaM ~MvA$M ~MvIqthO GRuqtasyaq guhyA# juShAqNA | 
damE#damE suShTuqtIrvA#vRudhAqnA prati# vAM jiqhvA GRuqtamucca#raNyEt ||
(Appearing in TS- 1.8.22.1)

2.5.12.1 - iqmaM mE# varuNaq>11, tat tvA# yAq>12
iqmaM mE# varuNa SrudhIq hava#maqdyA ca# mRuDaya | tvAma#vaqsyurA ca#kE ||

tattvA# yAmiq brahma#NAq vanda#mAnaqstadA SA$stEq yaja#mAnO haqvirBi#H | 
ahE#DamAnO varuNEqha bOqdhyuru#Sa(gm)saq mA naq AyuqH pramO#ShIH ||
(Appearing in TS- 2.1.11.6)

2.5.12.1 - myu duqtyaM>13, ciqtraM >14
uduq tyaM jAqtavE#dasaM dEqvaM ~Mva#hanti kEqtava#H | dRuqSE viSvA#yaq sUrya$M ||

ciqtraM dEqvAnAq-muda#gAqdanI#kaqM cakShu# rmiqtrasyaq varu#NasyAq&gnEH |
A&prAq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI aqntari#kShaq(gm)q sUrya# AqtmA jaga#tastasthuSha#Sca ||
(Appearing in TS- 1.4.43.1)

2.5.12.3 - A nO# mitrAvaruNAq>15, pra bAqhavA$>16
A nO# mitrAvaruNA GRuqtairgavyU#timukShataM | madhvAq rajA(gm)#si sukratU ||

pra bAqhavA# sisRutaM jIqvasE# naq A nOq gavyU#timukShataM GRuqtEna# | 
A nOq janE$ SravayataM ~MyuvAnA SruqtaM mE# mitrAvaruNAq havEqmA ||
(Appearing in TS- 1.8.22.3)

2.5.12.5 vi pAja#sAq>17
vi pAja#sApRuqthunAq SOSu#cAnOq bAdha#sva dviqShO raqkShasOq amI#vAH |
suqSarma#NO bRuhaqtaH Sarma#Ni syAmaqgnEraqha(gm) suqhava#syaq praNI#tau ||
(Appearing in TS- 4.1.5.1)

2.5.12.5 vi jyOti#ShA>18
vijyOti#ShA bRuhaqtA BA$tyaqgnirAqvi-rviSvA#ni kRuNutE mahiqtvA |
prA&dE#vI-rmAqyAH sa#hatE-duqrEvAqH SiSI#tEq SRu~ggEq rakSha#sE viqnikShE$ ||
(Appearing in TS- 1.2.14.7)

2.5.12.5aq(gm)qhOqmucE# >19, viqvEShaq yanmAq>20
aq(gm)qhOqmucEq praBa#rEmA manIqShA mO#ShiShThaq-dAvnE# sumaqtiM gRu#NAqnAH | 
iqdami#ndraq prati# haqvyaM gRu#BAya saqtyAH sa#ntuq yaja#mAnasyaq kAmA$H || 
viqvEShaq yanmA# dhiqShaNA# jaqjAnaq stavai# puqrA pAryAqdindraq mahna#H | 
a(gm)ha#sOq yatra# pIqparaqdyathA# nO nAqvEvaq yAnta# muqBayE# havantE || 
(Appearing in TS- 1.6.12.3)

2.5.12.5 vina# iqndrE>21, ndra# kShaqtra>22
vi na# indraq mRudhO# jahi nIqcA ya#cCa pRutanyaqtaH | 
aqdhaqspaqdaM tamI$M kRudhiq yO aqsmA(gm) a#BiqdAsa#ti ||

indra# kShaqtramaqBi vAqmamOjO &jA#yathA vRuShaBa car.ShaNIqnAM | 
apA#&nudOq jana#mamitraq yanta# muqruM dEqvEByO# akRuNOru lOqkaM || 
(Appearing in TS- 1.6.12.4)

2.5.12.5 indriqyANi# SatakraqtO>23, &nu# tE dAyi>24
iqndriqyANi# SatakratOq yA tEq janE#Shu paq~jcasu# | 
indraq tAni# taq A vRu#NE ||

anu# tE dAyi maqha i#ndriqyAya# saqtrAtEq viSvaqmanu# vRutraqhatyE$ | 
anu# kShaqtramanuq sahO# yajaqtrEndra# dEqvEBiqranu# tE nRuqShahyE$ || 
(Appearing in TS- 1.6.12.1)
================================
OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH, 
SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM

2.6	 dvitIyakANDE ShaShThaH praSnaH - avaSiShTakarmABidhAnaM
